title: Cosmic Queries: COSMOS with Steven Soter
description: Questions about the science and visualizations in the COSMOS series on FOX? Get the answers from Neil deGrasse Tyson and Dr. Steven Soter, co-writer of both COSMOS series.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
content:encoded: Questions about the science and visualizations in the COSMOS series on FOX? Get the answers from Neil deGrasse Tyson and Dr. Steven Soter, co-writer of both COSMOS series.
